issue.title: Remove header from image.proto. Remove time from image_stamped.proto

content.raw:
I think stamped has a purpose, and every message should have a stamped version and a header-less version. The stamped version would be for using stand alone, and the non-stamped would be for including in other messages.

For example, sending a `Contact` message with a timestamp should only require 1 header. Right now it has 13 headers. Removing stamped messages means keeping this problem.

```
header
position.header
normal.header
wrench.header
wrench.body_1_wrench.header
wrench.body_1_wrench.force.header
wrench.body_1_wrench.torque.header
wrench.body_1_wrench.force_offset.header
wrench.body_2_wrench.header
wrench.body_2_wrench.force.header
wrench.body_2_wrench.torque.header
wrench.body_2_wrench.force_offset.header
time.header
```
